mapper.select: SELECT b.borrow_nid AS borrowNid, bi.`name` AS borrowName, b.borrow_user_name AS borrowUserName, FORMAT(b.account, 2) AS account, CONCAT(b.borrow_apr, '%') borrowApr, CASE WHEN borrow_style = 'endday' THEN CONCAT(b.borrow_period, '天') ELSE CONCAT(b.borrow_period, '个月') END borrowPeriod, b.borrow_style AS borrowStyle, bs.`name` AS borrowStyleName, bpt.borrow_name AS projectTypeName, IFNULL(bi.repay_org_name,'') AS repayOrgName, DATE_FORMAT( b.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS createTime, b.create_user_name AS createUserName, CASE WHEN b.`status` = 0 THEN '备案中' WHEN b.`status` = 1 THEN '初审中' WHEN b.`status` = 2 THEN '投资中' WHEN b.`status` = 3 THEN '复审中' WHEN b.`status` = 4 THEN '还款中' WHEN b.`status` = 5 THEN '已还款' WHEN b.`status` = 8 THEN '逾期中' ELSE '' END AS borrowStatus FROM ht_borrow b LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_info bi ON bi.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_style bs ON bs.nid = b.borrow_style LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_project_type bpt ON bpt.borrow_cd = b.project_type WHERE b.borrow_nid = #{borrowNid}
